hackathon-judges.judge-role: Northeastern Illinois University - Department of Computer Science

hackathon-eligibility:
1) Participants must be college students -- undergrad or grad.
2) All teammates must have pre-registered for SASEhack through
3) Teams must be
4) Hacks must have started at SASEhack. Any prior work may not be used at SASEhack, but prior ideas are welcome!
hackathon-requirements:
Hacks can be:
1) Software
2) Hardware
3) Whatever your wonderful mind comes up with!
As long as it's inline with the theme of the event.
hackathon-rules:
1) Don't cheat.
2) Don't steal.
3) Don't hurt anyone.
4) If you have to ask "Is this legal?" It probably isn't. Don't do it.
See our code of conduct 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $1000 will be divided evenly between the team members listed.
$500 will be divided evenly between the team members listed.
$250 will be divided evenly between the team members listed.

hackathon-description-header: SASEhack is a hackathon that invites students with design, engineering, and entrepreneur interests to collaborate on creating innovative solutions for real-world challenges.
